prefix_and_hash.name: Prefix Sum — Running Sum Array
prefix_and_hash.description: Given an array of integers, return an array where each element i is the sum of nums[0..i].

prefix_and_hash.name: Prefix Sum — Subarray Sum Equals K
prefix_and_hash.description: Return the number of contiguous subarrays whose sum equals k using prefix sums and hashmap frequency counting.
prefix_and_hash.signature: def subarray_sum(nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:

prefix_and_hash.name: Prefix Sum — Longest Subarray with Sum K
prefix_and_hash.description: Return the length of the longest contiguous subarray with sum equal to k using a prefix sum index map.
prefix_and_hash.signature: def longest_subarray_sum_k(nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:

prefix_and_hash.name: Prefix Sum — Count Subarrays with Even/Odd Sum
prefix_and_hash.description: Count the number of subarrays whose sum is even by tracking prefix sum parity using a hashmap.

prefix_and_hash.name: Prefix Sum — Longest Binary Subarray with Equal 0s and 1s
prefix_and_hash.description: Given a binary array, return the length of the longest contiguous subarray with equal number of 0s and 1s by converting 0→-1 and using prefix sums.

prefix_and_hash.name: Difference Array — Efficient Range Updates
prefix_and_hash.description: Apply multiple range increment operations efficiently using a difference array and reconstruct the final result using prefix sum reconstruction.

prefix_and_hash.name: Hash Map — Character Frequency Counter
prefix_and_hash.description: Given a string, return a frequency map counting all characters. Often used as a helper in anagram, window, and grouping problems.
